original_title: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell(Proudly Made In India) (3-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 1.5kg Pair (2 x 1.5kg) Pink Hex Dumbbell Hand Weights Set with Non-Slip Grip, Cast Iron Free Weights for Home Gym Weights Set and Fitness Training for women and men

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (3-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in gyms, or in fitness classes.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and class participants looking for light fixed-weight dumbbells.
image_analysis.ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth matte neoprene coating rests on a white surface. Each end cap is clearly printed with the KAKSS brand and 1.5 KG weight in white, and the flat hex shape keeps them from rolling between uses.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Solid cast iron core with neoprene coating resists cracking and chipping over time
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap vinyl or sand-filled dumbbells split, leak or deform after a few months

comparison_points.our_benefit: Non-slip neoprene grip stays secure even with sweaty hands for safer workouts
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Smooth plastic handles get slippery, forcing users to stop or risk dropping weights

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagonal shape keeps KAKSS dumbbells from rolling on home or studio floors
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells roll under furniture or feet, creating tripping and safety hazards

comparison_points.our_benefit: Clear 1.5 kg print and pink colour coding make weight selection fast and mistake-free
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Unmarked or faded weights cause confusion and accidental use of the wrong size
